summary.body: Does anyone know of storage facilities near here?  Just for about 6 weeks.  It's for boxes of books and cds and a blanket box.  No large items of furniture apart from two book cases 3' 6" wide and 6' tall (sorry don't do decimals).
summary.subject: Storage

summary.body: after a long wait I am the proud renter of a baggage store in defoe ... [but john trundle would be easier if anyone wants to swap] being new to them, I wondered if stuff like paper / cardboard files etc is ok down there or do they get damp?  and could i safely store summer / winter clothes there out of season? i'm mentally scarred by the cellar of my former victorian house where cardboard mulched within three minutes, so any advice gratefully received ...  thanks
summary.subject: baggage stores

summary.body: I have just had the most extraordinary experience.  I contracted to rent a store room at the beginning of january and accordingly put my stuff in the room.  Unknown to me, the barbican office staff then let it to someone else 2 weeks later and apparently removed all my stuff, some of which was new,  and allegedly destroyed it!!   I appear to have been burgled by the corporation and my storeroom is now being used by someone else.  Despite the fact that I am still the lawful occupant of my storeroom as the office could not legally let it to someone else, this seems to be regarded as my problem.  Has this happened to anyone else?
summary.subject: storerooms

summary.body: Hi, Just moved into Shakespeare Tower (which we are loving).  I inquired about storage and have been offered "baggage stores 741".  I am obviously too much of a pack-rat, as I think I could potentially fill a wall of these units.... My questions:  Are all storage units this tiny?  If there are bigger ones available, should I wait?  If I take this one, are my chances of getting a second or bigger storage unit diminished, or years away?? Many thanks for your advice!
summary.subject: Storage Units

summary.body: Does anybody know of any self storage units near here?
summary.subject: Self storage units?

summary.body: I need to put some furniture in storage for a while. Can anyone suggest a good/cheap storage company in the area? I would also consider a private arrangement with someone with a garage or similar space.
summary.subject: Storage

summary.body: Does anyone know why it is not advisable to store feather and down duvets in those very useful vacuum storage bags?
summary.subject: Vacuum storage bags

summary.body: We're moving from renting to buying in the Barbican and the new flat will be smaller.  We'll be putting a request in for a store room as - but as far as we can gather, this could take up to a year! Does anyone have any spare space in their store room we could borrow/rent?
summary.subject: Sorage space
